description:
Coriyule Stage 2 - 525m2
No frustrating restrictions. The Coriyule Estate Drysdale is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that Drysdale has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. The deposit of only $5,000 is kept low to help you get into the market. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Prime Allotment!
Situated in the prestigious Curlewis Parks Estate is this very desirable parcel of land. Measuring 512m2 with a 16m frontage this allotment is a perfect size to accomodate your new dream home.Situated close to reserves, schools, shops and public transport- you have everything at your finger tips. Located just 15 minutes to Geelong and only minutes from the busy & vibrant township of Drysdale. You will quickly discover all the benefits of living on the Bellarine Peninsula and the lifestyle it offers.

Quality in Curlewis
Scheduled for a mid-April completion, this brilliantly designed and meticulously finished product will appeal to those looking for a new quality home without the hassles. With proven results, this quality boutique builder is presenting to market a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living area home with double garage, alfresco living and landscaped surrounds in a developed pocket of new Curlewis. Timber flooring, in-situ shower bases, high ceilings, quality fixtures and fittings and plenty of storage, this property will meet the requirements of the most fastidious purchaser. Call Daniel Lamanna today for access and full list of Specification information.

"A Stunning Setting - Attuned to Today"
This immaculately presented home offers a modern approach to living and lifestyle. Lavished with three light filled bedrooms all with built in robes.
The master zone offers a generous bedroom with decadent ensuite and plentiful walk in robe. The formal lounge is family friendly and ideal for relaxed living.
The additional main living quarters are open plan, functional and fresh.
The tasteful fittings coupled with the quality appliances give you a taste of what's in store throughout this home.
The kitchen exudes a master chef standard and encourages social entertaining with the dining and living adjoining this stylish space. The large glass doors that open on the stunning outdoor entertaining deck packs an entertainer's punch primed for family and friends to enjoy as Spring sets in. The surrounding landscape is low maintenance making it very easy to simply enjoy without the upkeep; yet refined enough to look lush all year round.
Offering a second living area for quiet family living.
The family bathroom is sleek in design with separate bath, large vanity and shower.
Additional features include:
ducted heating, split system cooling, double garage, down lights and designer light fittings.
Nestled in a formidable location well connected to the peninsula yet attractive to the CBD commuter, this is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a luxurious home ready to move in and enjoy from the onset.
Home Owner: 'This home is ideal for someone that doesn't want to build‚Äù
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like no other!

address: Lot 63 No. 80 Anstead Avenue CURLEWIS VIC 3222
description:
Ready to Build?
This 511m2 block is fully serviced and ready to build on. Located in the new Curlewis Parks estate with brand new houses around you and parks close by, this will make a great family home site. 16 meter frontage and 32 meters deep, this block is flat, fenced on 2 sides and with NBN connections available, why wait to build your new home. Easy access to local primary school, Drysdale shopping center, lakes and sporting facilities.

Stylish Home Offering Outstanding Value!
Why build when you can experience the excitement of coming home to this beautifully presented property... where quality and fresh contemporary spaces, set the tone for a fully faceted modern lifestyle. Dressed with an attractive street-frontage and family friendly floor plan. 4 spacious bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stone bench and top of the line appliances, 2 light filled living areas plus open plan dining and 2 central bathrooms. Alfresco entertaining is perfect for all occasions accompanied by low maintenance gardens. Ample off street parking includes remote DLUG and side rear access perfect for caravan / boat. This affordable home and location offers a whole new world of comfort and convenience boasting easy access to all of the Bellerine's finest amenities, including local schools, Drysdale Village and Clifton Springs waterfront precinct & boat ramp. Great value in highly sought after estate.

Brand new & ready to move in
Built to the highest standards by a meticulous builder this is quality. Separate formal lounge or theatre room. Master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with a 1200mm shower. Open plan living kitchen, dining & family living. Kitchen with 900mm standalone oven with gas cook top. Island prep bench, kitchen sink under the window. Dishwasher included. Timber floors in the dining & passage. Bedrooms carpeted. Bedrooms 2, 3, 4 with built in robes & mirror finish doors. Large linen press in passage & laundry. Designed for living with a low maintenance yard. If you are looking for new without the wait then you must inspect this one.

Prestige Family Property
This great 50 sq (Approx) residence offers lifestyle at its best. Comprising five bedrooms, three bathrooms, office, formal dining, lounge, billiard room, family room, alfresco, heated indoor pool, tennis court, this property has it all. - The list goes on and on.
For the tradesman, and others, there is also a large steel framed shed of some 30 x 12 metres which has workshop, storage and stable facilities.
Situated on 2.4ha of undulating land this property is only minutes from Geelong, numerous
beaches and easy commuting distance to Melbourne. Port Phillip Bay only 1km.
With four paddocks and the stables the property the property is more than suitable to the horse enthusiast.
(Co-listing Agent Michael Lowe 0407 816 167)
Marcus Illingworth : 0410 308 722
